entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for August 20, 2024

summary.caption:
On the next pass, however, Helen failed to clear the 
mountains.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for August 20, 2024

summary.caption: "Okay, Professor Big Mouth, we've all chipped in — here’s the hundred bucks! ... But remember, you gotta kiss her on the lips!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for August 20, 2024

summary.caption: “I don’t like the looks of this.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for August 20, 2024

summary.caption: With one glance, Luanne sized up the two males in their goldfinch necklaces.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for August 20, 2024

summary.caption: “I said I wasn’t interested. … Now please remove your foot from the cave.”
